articles.title: Parameswaran Iyer to take over as Niti Aayog CEO as Amitabh Kant leaves
articles.description: Parameswaran Iyer, a 1981-batch IAS officer of Uttar Pradesh cadre and a well-known sanitation specialist, has been appointed the chief executive officer of Niti Aayog, after Amitabh Kant retires on June 30.

articles.title: For Droupadi Murmu, Running For President, A Show Of Strength Led by PM
articles.description: Droupadi Murmu, the BJP-led NDA's pick for president, today filed her nomination for the post in the presence of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and senior BJP and alliance leaders, in a big show of strength ahead of the July 18 presidential election.

Draupadi Murmu is the first woman tribal leader to file her nomination for the post of President.
